name: Hugo på nye Eventyr
storyline: The little troll Hugo is on a new adventure to free his wife Hugolina and their three children from being captured by the evil witch Scylla. She has put many obstacles in his way with much cunning and malice. Would he finally reach the cave to free his family, Scylla is already there waiting for him!
